attributes.action: Establish councils to include a charge within the council tax to for insurance to cover any flood eventualities within previously flooded areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils should be making a charge within the council tax to ensure that all who live within defined areas of flood risk, will have access to proper insurance cover. This will alleviate the problem of those who do not have sufficient insurance, being compensated by the government.
